resources.string:
\t This app was developed with the car enthusiast in mind. If you work on your own vehicle, this application is for you!
You can add as many vehicles as you like and then keep track of all of the maintenance you\'ve done.This application will also update you when your next service is due (as long as you set the time frame). This application was developed using Android Studio using Kotlin in just over a month.
Developed in 2022 by Stephen Sysak.
